name: Anthophobia
description:
Anthophobia is side-scrolling action survival horror game where the world is falling apart by unknown infection.
Travel through the post-apocalyptic environment and fight against horde of green zombies.


Feature
  • Side-scrolling action survival horror experience
  • Unique horrifying monsters and bosses
  • Oddly adorable support NPCs
  • Over 75 pixel animation sex scenes
  • 29 illustration by artists Fenrir/Sourjelly/Tsuyuta Kome/Jotti
  • + 12 original illustration from V1.00(can be found in installed folder)
  • 6 ~ 8 hours of gameplay
